#Make tables:

#Table 1:
```{r echo=FALSE, out.width="100%", tabe1}
# Load the table from the RDS file
table1 <- readRDS("data/table1.rds")

# Display the table using knitr::kable() with 3 decimal places
knitr::kable(table1, digits = 3)
```
#Table 2:
